dji.sdk.api.GroundStation

Class DJIHotPointInitializationInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • dji.sdk.api.GroundStation.DJIHotPointInitializationInfo

  • public class DJIHotPointInitializationInfo
extends java.lang.Object

    DJI Hot Point Initialization Info Class

    This is a data structure for initialization of hot point mission. As the input parameter, DJIHotPointInitializationInfo will provide basic information, such as interested point's latitude, longitude and altitude, for startHotPoint function in DJIInspireGroundStation. Developer could adjust the start point and moving mode while the drone executes the hot point mission.
    Version:
    V2.3.0
    Author:
    : DJI Software

      double altitude
      Hot Point's altitude[5m ~ The limit altitude(eg.
      DJIGroundStationTypeDef.GroundStationHotPointInterestDirection interestDirection
      This will determine the interesting direction.
      North - north to the hot point South - south to the hot point West - west to the hot point East - east to the hot point Nearest - from current position to nearest point on the hot circle
      double latitude
      Hot point's latitude.
      double longitude
      Hot Point's longitude.
      DJIGroundStationTypeDef.GroundStationHotPointNavigationMode navigationMode
      The yaw direction of hot point mission SurroundHeadingAlongTheCircleLookingForward - Along the circle looking forward SurroundHeadingTowardHotPoint - Toward the hot point SurroundHeadingBackwardHotPoint - Backward the hot point SurroundHeadingControlByRemoteController - Heading Controlled by remote controller SurroundHeadingAlongTheCircleLookingBackward - Along the circle looking backward
      double radius
      The track radius[5m ~ 500m].
      DJIGroundStationTypeDef.GroundStationHotPointSurroundDirection surroundDirection
      The direction of encircling the hot point.
      int velocity
      Angular velocity of drone, the unit is degree/second.
